content.rendered:
Directed by R. Ajay Gnanamuthu.

Written by Pattukottai Prabhakar.

Cast Nayanthara(Anjali Vikramadityan). Atharvaa Murali(Dr. Arjun Prabakar). Anurag Kashyap(Rudra aka ACP Martin Roy). Raashi Khanna(Krithika Rao). Vijay Sethupathi(Vikram Vikramadityan). Devan(Narayanan). Ramesh Thilak(Vinoth, Arjun’s Friend). Vinoth Kishan(Vineeth). Manasvi Kottachi(Shalini Vikramadithyan (as Baby Manasvi)). Sai Krishna(Ram). Abishek Raaja(Surya (as Abishek Raja)).Beesu Sureswa.Vikram Anand. Udhayabanu Maheshwaran(Mr. Gowda (as Uday Mahesh)).Ranesh Thiagarajan.Jeeva Ravi.Aarthi.Rebbaca.Purushothaman.Renji.Kailash. Vivek Raju(Prathap).Vetrivel Raja.Pradeep.Ashok Pandian.Sindhu.Jyothi Murur.Sashikala.Kishore Rajkumar.Aravinth Sundar.Vasanth.Faritha.Krishna.Karthik Bala.Kalaiyarasan Sathiyaa.Ramanathan.Kumar Natarajan.Arvind.Preethi.Lakshmi.Ritz.Swaroop.Ganesh P.S. . Krishnakumar Menon(News reader)

Language Tamil.

Producers C J Jayakumar.

Production Cameo Films India. Drumsticks Productions.
